data.title: Suman: Movies, Photos, Videos, News, Biography & Birthday
data.meta_description: Suman: Check out the list of all Suman movies along with photos, videos, biography and birthday. Also find latest Suman news on Times of India.
data.text:
Anita Hassanandani: I am glad that after saas-bahu dramas, our show Suman Indori is experimenting with jethani-devrani relationship

TNN / Aug 16, 2024, 17:33 (IST)

Anita Hassanandani on her new show Suman Indori, and why she loves playing strong roles on TV.

'Raghu Thatha' twitter review: Keerthy Suresh starrer fetches her accolades

etimes.in / Aug 15, 2024, 10:00 (IST)

The Tamil film 'Raghu Thatha,' directed by debutant Suman Kumar, stars Keerthy Suresh and has been released in theatres. The political comedy centers on a woman fighting to protect her land and identity. Keerthy's performance, praised by netizens, has made the film a strong contender against 'Thangalaan' and 'Demonte Colony 2'.

Ashnoor Kaur and Anita Hassanandani gear up to clash in new show, ‘Suman Indori’; the former says 'This show marks my comeback on television after 3 years'

etimes.in / Aug 14, 2024, 23:32 (IST)

The new show 'Suman Indori' brought the family drama alive, centering on Suman, a kind-hearted chaat vendor who becomes the reluctant bride of Teerth, a shrewd politician. She faces challenges from her assertive Jethani, Devika. Featuring Ashnoor Kaur as Suman, Zain Imam as Teerth, and Anita Hassanandani as Devika, the narrative promises an engaging family conflict.

Mithijhora: Anirban puts in effort to come closer to Rai

etimes.in / Aug 14, 2024, 18:46 (IST)

Anirban and Rai gave their marriage another chance in 'Mithijhora'. Despite Anirban’s efforts, his mother Sohini tried to create mistrust between them, making Rai uncomfortable. Anirban recognized the threat to their relationship and hesitated to doubt Rai again. The show highlights challenges in their marital journey and Rai’s struggle for comfort.

Keerthy Suresh's 'Raghu Thatha' is a political satire!

etimes.in / Aug 14, 2024, 16:00 (IST)

The film 'Raghu Thatha,' produced by the 'KGF' team, marks their debut in Kollywood. Directed by Suman Kumar, it stars Keerthy Suresh in a political comedy role, where she navigates self-discovery amid government regulations. The film is set to release on August 15, clashing with 'Thangalaan' and 'Demonte Colony 2'.

Mithijhora: Sohini keeps planting doubts about Rai in Anirban’s mind

etimes.in / Aug 13, 2024, 15:46 (IST)

Mithijhora has progressed with Rai and Anirban's attempt to rekindle their marriage. Despite Anirban's mother Sohini's disapproval and her attempts to ruin their relationship, Rai decided to return to her in-laws' house. However, Sohini's continued instigation has sown seeds of doubt in Anirban's mind about Rai's intentions.

Mithijhora: Sohini humiliates Rai as she gets back with Anirban

etimes.in / Aug 12, 2024, 17:54 (IST)

The Bengali television show ‘Mithijhora’ saw Rai and Anirban starting their married life again after Rai left her abusive family and found independence. Anirban's realization of his mistakes and persistent efforts for reconciliation eventually convinced Rai to return. However, Rai faced new challenges from her manipulative mother-in-law, Sohini, casting doubts on her integrity.

Keerthy Suresh gives a smart reply to a question on her political entry

etimes.in / Aug 12, 2024, 14:33 (IST)

Keerthy Suresh was involved in promoting her film 'Raghu Thatha,' releasing on August 15. While supporting actor Vijay's political interests, she clarified she has no immediate political ambitions. Directed by Suman Kumar and focusing on Tamil people's challenges with Hindi, the film includes notable actors and will compete with others during the Independence Day weekend.

Mithijhora: Rai agrees to return to her in-laws’ with Anirban

etimes.in / Aug 11, 2024, 09:30 (IST)

Rai finally agreed to return home with Anirban after his repeated apologies and efforts. Despite facing deceit and doubts about her character, she stood firm. Sourya exposed Nilu's deceit while Rai pursued her own career. The story revolves around Rai, Nilanjana, and Srowtashini, as they navigate family responsibilities and relationships.

Mithijhora: After Vikram’s mediation, Sourya agrees to take Nilu back home

etimes.in / Aug 09, 2024, 14:40 (IST)

Mithijhora follows the fallout of Nilu's deception and Anirban’s strained relationship with Rai. After Rai saved Anirban and decided to leave him, Anirban felt guilty for doubting her. Despite multiple attempts to win her back, Rai chose to move on. Sourya eventually capitulated to taking Nilu back due to legal obligations.

Mithijhora: Anirban sends Rai a special gift to soften her resolve

etimes.in / Aug 08, 2024, 18:56 (IST)

The television show ‘Mithijhora’ featured a dramatic turn when Anirban realized his mistake of doubting Rai due to Nilu's deceit. Despite Rai's refusal to return to a relationship lacking trust, Anirban's persistent apologies and attempts at reconciliation continued. The show explores Rai's struggle for independence amidst family betrayals and misunderstandings.

Mithijhora: Nilu refuses to leave her house after being abandoned by Sourya

etimes.in / Aug 07, 2024, 15:11 (IST)

In 'Mithijhora,' Rai revealed she was alive, clearing up misunderstandings caused by her sister Nilu. Anirban, feeling guilty for doubting Rai, apologized, but Rai decided not to return to a distrustful relationship. Sourya exposed Nilu's deceit but refused to take her back. Rai and Nilu's family faced unresolved tensions.

Mithijhora: Rai leaves Anirban’s house, Sourya brings Nilu before Rai

etimes.in / Aug 06, 2024, 18:23 (IST)

Rai proved she is alive, saving Anirban from wrongful arrest. Sourya exposed Nilu's plot, causing Anirban to feel guilty and seek Rai’s forgiveness. Rai, feeling betrayed by her family, decided to live independently. Despite Anirban’s apology, she refused to return. Sourya also abandoned Nilu. 'Mithijhora' depicts complex family dynamics and misunderstandings.

Mithijhora: Rai comes out before Anirban leaving everyone shocked

etimes.in / Aug 03, 2024, 17:09 (IST)

Mithijhora treated viewers to new twists as Anirban discovered the truth about the photos and sought Rai's forgiveness. Believing Rai had died in an accident, Anirban attempted suicide. However, Rai revealed she was alive just in time. Despite Anirban's apology, Rai chose not to return to a relationship lacking trust.

Mithijhora: Anirban confesses to the police as everyone mourns Rai

etimes.in / Aug 02, 2024, 20:31 (IST)

The current storyline of Bengali TV show 'Mithijhora' took a dramatic turn with Anirban and Rai’s family finding themselves at a morgue. Anirban’s guilt intensifies after discovering Rai’s sister Nilu's sabotage, and news of a fatal accident leads the family to believe Rai has died. Anirban confesses his actions to the police, feeling responsible for Rai’s fate.

Mithijhora: Anirban gets to know about Rai’s accident

etimes.in / Aug 01, 2024, 18:40 (IST)

In a recent twist on 'Mithijhora,' Anirban realized Rai's innocence after Sourya revealed Nilu's deceit. Anirban sent divorce papers to Rai but subsequently discovered the truth. As Anirban tried to reconcile, Rai went missing in a suspected accident. Amidst this turmoil, Anirban was arrested based on accusations from Rai's mother.

Jagdeep Dhankhar defends RSS in Rajya Sabha, opposition protests

TNN / Aug 01, 2024, 02:36 (IST)

Rajya Sabha chairman Jagdeep Dhankhar defended the RSS as having 'unimpeachable credentials' and criticized attempts to single out the organization during a session. Dhankhar interjected when SP member Ramji Lal Suman suggested that BJP evaluates individuals based on RSS affiliation. Opposition leader Mallikarjun Kharge protested, but Dhankhar insisted his intervention was constitutional.
